long_description: A sturdy hardtail mountain bike with fast-rolling 29 in. wheels, the Scott Aspect 950 29er offers responsive handling at a great value for beginners and experienced riders alike. Sturdy 6061 double-butted aluminum frame withstands demands of trail use and supplies great handling; replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend usable life of frame. Suntour XCT-29-MLO fork meets trails with 100mm of travel to buffer rough trail features; fork can be locked out for more efficient climbing. Shimano shifters and derailleurs snap through the 24 gear combinations for quick, precise shifts. Shimano mechanical disc brakes supply sure stopping power, even in wet conditions. Impac Ridgepac tires offer all-terrain handling and traction. Specs on the Scott Aspect 950 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: A sturdy hardtail mountain bike with fast-rolling 29 in. wheels, the Scott Aspect 950 29er offers responsive handling at a great value for beginners and experienced riders alike.
